description: This file contains utility functions for formatting messages and images for integration with external APIs such as WatsonX and Cohere. It processes Message objects, handles image encoding, and prepares message payloads.

methods.name: _format_images_for_message
methods.description: Formats images within a message into a list of dictionaries suitable for WatsonX, encoding images as base64 data URLs.

methods.name: format_messages
methods.description: Formats a list of Message objects into a list of dictionaries suitable for the Cohere API, including handling images and warnings for unsupported media types.
